web_development_subtitle: I have experience in web development. I am specialized in React, although I also use other frameworks such as Vue or Angular.
app_development_subtitle: I have experience in app development. I develop mobile applications with React Native and web applications with Nextjs and React
resources_subtitle: In my free time I try to keep up with technology and I write posts to bring what I learn closer to whoever wants to read it (and it also helps me so I don't have to look for it anymore)
ready_to: Do you have a project in mind? Do you want me to be part of your team? Contact me with a simple form
user_message: Hi ! #name thank you for your message. I will contact you as soon as possible.
success: The message has been sent successfully, I will answer you as soon as possible. In the meantime, take a look at my portfolio.
error: An error has ocurred, you can try again later. In the meantime, take a look at my portfolio.
